title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 407.13 - Environmental health and infection control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 407.13 - Environmental health and infection control

State Regulations
(a) PCHs/CAHs shall comply with the
provisions of section
405.24
of this Title with regard
to assuring a safe and suitable environment for patients. (b) PCHs/CAHs shall comply with the provision
of section
405.11
of this Title with regard
to infection control requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
407.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
